column4: Qualcomm to meet China regulators in push to clear $44 billion NXP deal: sources
column5: BEIJING Qualcomm Inc  is expecting to meet this week in Beijing with China's antitrust regulators in a final push to secure clearance for its proposed $44 billion acquisition of NXP Semiconductors NV   three sources told Reuters.

column4: UPDATE 1-Qualcomm to meet China regulators in push to clear $44 bln NXP deal- sources
column5: * Qualcomm to meet regulators before Wilbur Ross arrives -sources
